message: Hi Bob, I have a fantastic product that I think you'll love. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm interested in the product, but $250 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $150?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. However, I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can do $220. Is that something you'd be interested in?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $220 is still a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $200?
I'm getting closer to your price, Bob. I can do $210, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I'm getting close, but I'm still a bit short. Would you be willing to go down to $190?
I'm trying to find a sweet spot, Bob. I can do $200, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I'm really close, but I'm still a bit short. Would you be willing to meet me at $195?
I'm trying to find a mutually beneficial price, Bob. I can do $205, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I'm really close, but I'm still a bit short. Would you be willing to meet me at $190?
